text:
I'm going to be presenting at a Developer HubSpot User Group along with <@U02G7H60YCS> and <@U05CAJG8D98> (DHUG) Oct 24, 2:00 – 3:00 PM (EDT). There will be a range of topics discussed from basic to more advanced.

Come to learn some basics of React templating, more advanced data fetching features for HubSpot CMS, a _super_ interesting use case from a current developer mixing development across multiple Hubs, and what the future holds in terms of new features!

<https://events.HubSpot.com/events/details/HubSpot-developer-presents-building-faster-and-smarter-react-and-HubSpot-cms/>
